author: kgilmer
msg: httplite: append SNAPSHOT to version in pom.

author: mukulg
msg: committing an implementation of a feature to control, if comment and PI nodes should be visible in schema 1.1 <assert> XDM trees. the default value of this feature is 'false'; therefore by default, comments and PIs won't be visible within <assert> XDM trees and an opposite behavior for this could be enabled by setting this feature to 'true'.
the decision to provide an user option for this, was recently made by the XML Schema WG.
